title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
### Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light

**Product Overview:**

Transform your home into a lush, thriving garden with the Hydroponics Growing System, designed for indoor gardening enthusiasts. This advanced system features a 12-pod hydroponics setup, a full-spectrum LED grow light, and an efficient water circulation system, making it perfect for growing a variety of plants year-round, regardless of the outdoor climate.

**Key Features:**

- **SMD LED Grow Light:**
  - **Technology:** State-of-the-art SMD LED technology
  - **Power:** 25W
  - **Spectrum:** Full-spectrum light that mimics natural sunlight
  - **Benefits:** 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights, which can speed up plant growth by up to 5 times

- **Advanced Water Circulation System:**
  - **Technique:** Advanced Deep Flow Technique
  - **Cycle:** Water is circulated every 30 minutes to ensure fresh, nutrient-rich water for your plants
  - **Noise Level:** Low noise operation keeps your garden quiet and peaceful

- **Self-Sufficient Water Tank:**
  - **Capacity:** 4L, providing enough water for up to 18 days of self-sufficient growth
  - **Features:** Includes a water level gauge to monitor water levels easily

- **Adjustable Height:**
  - **Maximum Extension:** 17.78 inches, allowing you to accommodate growing plants and different plant types

- **Built-in Timer:**
  - Automates the lighting and water circulation, ensuring optimal conditions for plant growth without constant monitoring

**What's in the Box:**

- 1 x Hydroponics System
- 1 x Set of Plant Food (A and B)
- 12 x Planting Hats
- 12 x Planting Baskets
- 12 x Biochar Mud
- 1 x Adapter
- 1 x User Manual

**Warranty and Support:**

- **Warranty Period:** 360 days
- **After-Sales Service:** Available to assist with any questions or issues you may encounter

**Why Choose the Hydroponics Growing System?**

- **Efficiency:** The combination of advanced LED technology and a reliable water circulation system ensures that your plants receive the best possible care.
- **Ease of Use:** The system is designed for beginners and experts alike, with a simple setup process and minimal maintenance required.
- **Versatility:** Suitable for growing a wide range of plants, from herbs and vegetables to flowers and ornamental plants.
- **Space-Saving:** The compact design fits perfectly on a countertop, windowsill, or any small space in your home.

**Customer Satisfaction:**

We stand behind our product and are committed to your satisfaction. If you have any questions or need assistance, our dedicated support team is here to help you every step of the way.

**Get Ready to Grow!**

Start your indoor gardening journey with the Hydroponics Growing System and enjoy fresh, healthy plants right at your fingertips. Order yours today and experience the joy of growing your own plants in the comfort of your home!
